class (HashAlgorithm (HASH c), DSIGNAlgorithm (DSIGN c), KESAlgorithm (KES c), VRFAlgorithm (VRF c), ContextDSIGN (DSIGN c) ~ (), ContextKES (KES c) ~ (), ContextVRF (VRF c) ~ (), Typeable c) ⇒ Crypto c where
  • type HASH c ∷ Type
  • type DSIGN c ∷ Type
  • type KES c ∷ Type
  • type VRF c ∷ Type
name: Crypto HASH DSIGN KES VRF

display_html: class (Crypto c, Typeable (VRF c), Condense (SigKES (KES c)), Signable (DSIGN c) (VKeyES c, Natural, KESPeriod), Signable (DSIGN c) (TxBody c), Signable (KES c) (BHBody c), Signable (VRF c) Seed, ToCBOR (VerKeyDSIGN (DSIGN c))) ⇒ TPraosCrypto c
name: TPraosCrypto

newtype ShelleyHash c = ShelleyHash {
  • unShelleyHash ∷ HashHeader c
}

display_html:
data ShelleyBlock c = ShelleyBlock {
  • shelleyBlockRaw ∷ !(Block c)
  • shelleyBlockHeaderHash ∷ !(ShelleyHash c)
}
name: ShelleyBlock ShelleyBlock shelleyBlockRaw shelleyBlockHeaderHash

class GetHeader blk where
  • data Header blk ∷ Type

display_html: class (HashAlgorithm (HASH c), DSIGNAlgorithm (DSIGN c), KESAlgorithm (KES c), VRFAlgorithm (VRF c), ContextDSIGN (DSIGN c) ~ (), ContextKES (KES c) ~ (), ContextVRF (VRF c) ~ (), Typeable c) ⇒ Crypto c

data TPraosFields c toSign = TPraosFields {
  • tpraosSignature ∷ SignedKES (KES c) toSign
  • tpraosToSign ∷ toSign
}
name: TPraosFields TPraosFields tpraosSignature tpraosToSign

display_html:
data TPraosToSign c = TPraosToSign {
  • tpraosToSignIssuerVK ∷ VerKeyDSIGN (DSIGN c)
  • tpraosToSignVrfVK ∷ VerKeyVRF (VRF c)
  • tpraosToSignEta ∷ CertifiedVRF (VRF c) Nonce
  • tpraosToSignLeader ∷ CertifiedVRF (VRF c) UnitInterval
  • tpraosToSignOCert ∷ OCert c
}
name: TPraosToSign TPraosToSign tpraosToSignIssuerVK tpraosToSignVrfVK tpraosToSignEta tpraosToSignLeader tpraosToSignOCert

display_html:
data TPraosParams = TPraosParams {
  • tpraosEpochInfo ∷ !(EpochInfo Identity)
  • tpraosSlotsPerKESPeriod ∷ !Word64
  • tpraosLeaderF ∷ !Double
  • tpraosSecurityParam ∷ !SecurityParam
  • tpraosMaxKESEvo ∷ !Word64
  • tpraosQuorum ∷ !Word64
  • tpraosMaxMajorPV ∷ !Natural
  • tpraosMaxLovelaceSupply ∷ !Word64
}
name: TPraosParams TPraosParams tpraosEpochInfo tpraosSlotsPerKESPeriod tpraosLeaderF tpraosSecurityParam tpraosMaxKESEvo tpraosQuorum tpraosMaxMajorPV tpraosMaxLovelaceSupply

display_html:
data TPraosProof c = TPraosProof {
  • tpraosEta ∷ CertifiedVRF (VRF c) Nonce
  • tpraosLeader ∷ CertifiedVRF (VRF c) UnitInterval
  • tpraosIsCoreNode ∷ TPraosIsCoreNode c
}
name: TPraosProof TPraosProof tpraosIsCoreNode tpraosEta tpraosLeader

display_html:
data TPraosIsCoreNode c = TPraosIsCoreNode {
  • tpraosIsCoreNodeOpCert ∷ !(OCert c)
  • tpraosIsCoreNodeColdVerKey ∷ !(VKey c)
  • tpraosIsCoreNodeSignKeyVRF ∷ !(SignKeyVRF (VRF c))
}
name: TPraosIsCoreNode TPraosIsCoreNode tpraosIsCoreNodeColdVerKey tpraosIsCoreNodeSignKeyVRF tpraosIsCoreNodeOpCert

  • data GenTx blk ∷ Type
  • type ApplyTxErr blk ∷ Type
  • txSize ∷ GenTx blk → TxSizeInBytes
  • txInvariant ∷ GenTx blk → Bool
  • applyTx ∷ LedgerConfig blk → GenTx blk → TickedLedgerState blk → Except (ApplyTxErr blk) (TickedLedgerState blk)
  • reapplyTx ∷ LedgerConfig blk → GenTx blk → TickedLedgerState blk → Except (ApplyTxErr blk) (TickedLedgerState blk)
name: ApplyTx GenTx ApplyTxErr txSize txInvariant applyTx reapplyTx

display_html:
data ShelleyGenesis c = ShelleyGenesis {
  • sgStartTime ∷ !SystemStart
  • sgNetworkMagic ∷ !NetworkMagic
  • sgProtocolMagicId ∷ !ProtocolMagicId
  • sgActiveSlotsCoeff ∷ !Double
  • sgDecentralisationParam ∷ !Double
  • sgSecurityParam ∷ !SecurityParam
  • sgEpochLength ∷ !EpochSize
  • sgSlotsPerKESPeriod ∷ !Word64
  • sgMaxKESEvolutions ∷ !Word64
  • sgSlotLength ∷ !SlotLength
  • sgUpdateQuorum ∷ !Word64
  • sgMaxMajorPV ∷ !Natural
  • sgMaxLovelaceSupply ∷ !Word64
  • sgMaxBodySize ∷ !Natural
  • sgMaxHeaderSize ∷ !Natural
  • sgGenDelegs ∷ !(Map (GenKeyHash c) (KeyHash c))
  • sgInitialFunds ∷ !(Map (Addr c) Coin)
}
name: ShelleyGenesis ShelleyGenesis sgStartTime sgNetworkMagic sgProtocolMagicId sgActiveSlotsCoeff sgDecentralisationParam sgSecurityParam sgEpochLength sgSlotsPerKESPeriod sgMaxKESEvolutions sgSlotLength sgUpdateQuorum sgMaxMajorPV sgMaxLovelaceSupply sgMaxBodySize sgMaxHeaderSize sgGenDelegs sgInitialFunds
